```{r}
## Calculates Congressional Productivity Percentages for Each Congress 108-118
## Total bill count variables from the dataset
total_S_108 = 3035
total_S_109 = 4122
total_S_110 = 3741
total_S_111 = 4059
total_S_112 = 3716
total_S_113 = 3020
total_S_114 = 3548
total_S_115 = 3805
total_S_116 = 5086
total_S_117 = 5357
total_S_118 = 5649

# (will take count of entries in that column on spreadsheet)
total_commemorative_108 = b
total_commemorative_109 = b
total_commemorative_110 = b
total_commemorative_111 = b
total_commemorative_112 = b
total_commemorative_113 = b
total_commemorative_114 = b
total_commemorative_115 = b
total_commemorative_116 = b
total_commemorative_117 = b
total_commemorative_118 = b

total_subsig_108 = b

total_subsig_110 = b

total_subsig_112 = b
total_subsig_113 = b
total_subsig_114 = b
total_subsig_115 = b
total_subsig_116 = b
total_subsig_117 = b
total_subsig_118 = b

total_substantive_108 = total_S_108 - (total_subsig_108 + total_commemorative_108)
total_substantive_109 = total_S_109 - (total_subsig_109 + total_commemorative_109)
total_substantive_110 = total_S_110 - (total_subsig_110 + total_commemorative_110)
total_substantive_111 = total_S_111 - (total_subsig_111 + total_commemorative_111)
total_substantive_112 = total_S_112 - (total_subsig_112 + total_commemorative_112)
total_substantive_113 = total_S_113 - (total_subsig_113 + total_commemorative_113)
total_substantive_114 = total_S_114 - (total_subsig_114 + total_commemorative_114)
total_substantive_115 = total_S_115 - (total_subsig_115 + total_commemorative_115)
total_substantive_116 = total_S_116 - (total_subsig_116 + total_commemorative_116)
total_substantive_117 = total_S_117 - (total_subsig_117 + total_commemorative_117)
total_substantive_118 = total_S_118 - (total_subsig_118 + total_commemorative_118)

# Productivity Measures for Each Congress

# 108th
percentage_com_108 = total_commemorative_108 / total_S_108
percentage_substantive_108 = total_substantive_108 / total_S_108
```
